channel.title: Have been sleeping, need todays information
channel.description: Well i have not been in these cheating community since kaitnieks RIP. Now if someone could tell me about Aryan, Sbot, Scar. So the infor what i want is that how detect able thease are? I have understood that RuneScape has now some macro detect? How does this work? And what is the best way to train just one account to your main? Or is there still that way? I have get that imagine that Scar can be so undetect able on "Humenlike" moves. But what is the undetect ablest?

item.title: Have been sleeping, need todays information
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Slavebot is nothing special, just a modded Aryan. I personally don’t have anything against the IMPSoft people (although the fact that they’ve gotten away from SCAR coding is distressing, and they’ve made themselves an ASSLOAD of enemies by ddosing, etc), but really, anyone who buys Slavebot is getting ripped. Easier to auto with SCAR - granted you can’t run multiple accounts at once, but with the SRL account switcher thingy it’s almost as good, and certainly less detectable. Plus, it’s free.

Read full topic
item.source: Have been sleeping, need todays information

item.title: Have been sleeping, need todays information
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Slave is an improved aryan. It isn’t less detectable then sbot. Most of the people that defend slavebot are users, a somewhat biased opinion. Aryan (what slavebot is based on) forces commands, and sbot and scar (of course) don’t force clicks/commands.

and spam, xerves was kidding…

Read full topic

item.title: Have been sleeping, need todays information
item.dc:creator: @s.p.a.m s.p.a.m
item.description:
@s.p.a.m wrote:

aryan = very detectable; aryan is used primarily for making money by mining, fishing, woodcutting, flax picking.
sbot = less detectable; used mostly for training accounts but still has a quite a high ban risk.
scar = less detectable again but it still gets people banned and is outdated.

You should now not use any bot or macro with your main at all.

Read full topic
